de.tud.kom.p2psim.email
Interface EmailServer

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentEventListener, TransMessageListener
public interface EmailServer
extends TransMessageListener

Email server ccan store emails. All communication with the server should take place over the network.

Version:
3.0, 30.11.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune

Field Summary
static short DEFAULT_PORT
          By default the server will listen at this port for incoming connection requests.
